entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
